languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс с шипением выдыхает сквозь зубы.{/n} "Я знал, что встреча на Райкаде Минорис не будет последней, но вот то, что мы вновь встретим эту анафему здесь... Кьява Гамма не просто впала в ересь, {name} — твой мир в когтях величайшего зла, что известно Империуму".

{n}Heinrix hisses through gritted teeth.{/n} "I knew our meeting on Rykad Minoris wouldn't be the last, but to run into this anathema here... Kiava Gamma did not merely succumb to heresy, {name}. Your world is in the clutches of the greatest evil known to the Imperium."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс с шипением выдыхает сквозь зубы.{/n} "Я знал, что встреча на Райкаде Минорис не будет последней, но вот то, что мы вновь встретим эту анафему здесь... Кьява Гамма не просто впала в ересь, {name} — твой мир в когтях величайшего зла, что известно Империуму".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hisses through gritted teeth.{/n} "I knew our meeting on Rykad wouldn't be the last, but to run into this anathema here... Kiava Gamma did not merely succumb to heresy, {name}. Your world is in the clutches of the greatest evil known to the Imperium."

{n}Heinrix hisses through gritted teeth.{/n} "I knew our meeting on Rykad wouldn't be the last, but to run into this anathema here... Kiava Gamma did not merely succumb to heresy, {name}. Your world is in the clutches of the greatest evil known to the Imperium."

{n}Heinrix hisses through gritted teeth.{/n} "I knew our meeting on Rykad wouldn't be the last, but to run into this anathema here... Kiava Gamma did not merely succumb to heresy, {name}. Your world is in the clutches of the greatest evil known to the Imperium."

{n}Heinrix hisses through gritted teeth.{/n} "I knew our meeting on Rykad wouldn't be the last, but to run into this anathema here... Kiava Gamma did not merely succumb to heresy, {name}. Your world is in the clutches of the greatest evil known to the Imperium."

{n}Heinrix hisses through gritted teeth.{/n} "I knew our meeting on Rykad Minoris wouldn't be the last, but to run into this anathema here... Kiava Gamma did not merely succumb to heresy, {name}. Your world is in the clutches of the greatest evil known to the Imperium."

languages.text: {n}海因里希咬牙切齿。{/n}“早在小莱卡德我就知道，那绝不会是我们与那些敌人最后一次见面，可我们居然会在这里撞上这种怪物……控制着基亚瓦伽马星的敌人，并不仅仅是异端分子，{name}。你的世界正处于帝国所知最邪恶的敌人的魔掌之中。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix hisses through gritted teeth.{/n} "I knew our meeting on Rykad Minoris wouldn't be the last, but to run into this anathema here... Kiava Gamma did not merely succumb to heresy, {name}. Your world is in the clutches of the greatest evil known to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希咬牙切齿。{/n}“早在莱卡德我就知道，那绝不会是我们与那些敌人最后一次见面，可我们居然会在这里撞上这种怪物……控制着基亚瓦伽马星的敌人，并不仅仅是异端分子，{name}。你的世界正处于帝国所知最邪恶的敌人的魔掌之中。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sisea entre sus dientes firmemente apretados.{/n}«Sabía que nuestro encuentro en Rykad Minoris no sería el último, pero encontrarnos aquí con esta aberración... Kiava Gamma no solo sucumbió a la herejía, {name}. Su mundo se encuentra entre las garras del mayor mal conocido por el Imperium».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix hisses through gritted teeth.{/n} "I knew our meeting on Rykad Minoris wouldn't be the last, but to run into this anathema here... Kiava Gamma did not merely succumb to heresy, {name}. Your world is in the clutches of the greatest evil known to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sisea entre sus dientes firmemente apretados.{/n}«Sabía que nuestro encuentro en Rykad no sería el último, pero encontrarnos aquí con esta aberración... Kiava Gamma no solo sucumbió a la herejía, {name}. Su mundo se encuentra entre las garras del mayor mal conocido por el Imperium».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、歯を食いしばって言葉を搾り出す。{/n}「ライカド・ミノリスでの件が最後ではないと思っていましたが、ここでコイツを目撃するとは…キアヴァ・ガンマは単に異端に屈服したわけじゃないということです、{name}さん。陛下の星は、帝国で知られている一番の悪党の手中にある」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix hisses through gritted teeth.{/n} "I knew our meeting on Rykad Minoris wouldn't be the last, but to run into this anathema here... Kiava Gamma did not merely succumb to heresy, {name}. Your world is in the clutches of the greatest evil known to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、歯を食いしばって言葉を搾り出す。{/n}「ライカド・ミノリスでの件が最後ではないと思っていましたが、ここでコイツを目撃するとは…キアヴァ・ガンマは単に異端に屈服したわけじゃないということです、{name}さん。陛下の星は、帝国で知られている一番の悪党の手中にある」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix zischt durch zusammengebissene Zähne.{/n} "Ich wusste, unsere Begegnung auf Rykad Minoris würde nicht die letzte sein, aber hier auf dieses Anathema zu treffen ... Kiava Gamma ist nicht einfach der Ketzerei erlegen, {name}. Eure Welt befindet sich in den Klauen des größten Übels, das das Imperium kennt."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix hisses through gritted teeth.{/n} "I knew our meeting on Rykad Minoris wouldn't be the last, but to run into this anathema here... Kiava Gamma did not merely succumb to heresy, {name}. Your world is in the clutches of the greatest evil known to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix zischt durch zusammengebissene Zähne:{/n} "Ich wusste, unsere Begegnung auf Rykad würde nicht die letzte sein, aber hier auf dieses Anathema zu treffen ... Kiava Gamma ist nicht einfach der Ketzerei erlegen, {name}. Eure Welt befindet sich in den Klauen des größten Übels, das das Imperium kennt."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix siffle entre ses dents :{/n} « Je savais que notre rencontre sur Rykad Minoris ne serait pas la dernière, mais croiser cet anathème ici... Kiava Gamma n'a pas simplement sombré dans l'hérésie, {name}. Votre monde est sous la coupe du plus grand mal connu de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix hisses through gritted teeth.{/n} "I knew our meeting on Rykad Minoris wouldn't be the last, but to run into this anathema here... Kiava Gamma did not merely succumb to heresy, {name}. Your world is in the clutches of the greatest evil known to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix siffle entre ses dents :{/n} « Je savais que notre rencontre sur Rykad ne serait pas la dernière, mais croiser cet anathème ici... Kiava Gamma n'a pas simplement sombré dans l'hérésie, {name}. Votre monde est sous la coupe du plus grand mal connu de l'Imperium. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, sıktığı dişlerinin arasından tıslıyor.{/n} "Rykad Minoris'teki karşılaşmamızın son olmayacağını biliyordum ama bu küfre burada rastlamak... Kiava Gama sapkınlığa yenik düşmekle kalmamış {name}. Dünyan, İmparatorluk'un gördüğü en büyük şerrin pençesine düşmüş."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix hisses through gritted teeth.{/n} "I knew our meeting on Rykad Minoris wouldn't be the last, but to run into this anathema here... Kiava Gamma did not merely succumb to heresy, {name}. Your world is in the clutches of the greatest evil known to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, sıktığı dişlerinin arasından tıslıyor.{/n} "Rykad Minoris'teki karşılaşmamızın son olmayacağını biliyordum ama bu küfre burada rastlamak... Kiava Gama sapkınlığa yenik düşmekle kalmamış {name}, dünyanı İmparatorluk gözündeki en büyük şer almış pençesine."
